message:
Refactor duplicate code in a new API Integers.parseInt(String, int), which also checks for empty strings in addition to nulls.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/log4j/log4j2/trunk@1501363 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

deleted: final int reconnectDelay = delay == null ? 0 : Integer.parseInt(delay);
final int port = portNum == null ? 0 : Integer.parseInt(portNum);
